items.sentence: I had a hard time trying to get this report finished on time.
The situation Tom described actually happened once in Boston.
Tom didn\'t build the doghouse that Mary wanted him to build.
Tom didn\'t change his plans, even though Mary wanted him to.
Tom didn\'t have to get up as early today as he usually does.
If I\'d known Tom\'s address, I\'d have written him a letter.
It may be more difficult to do that than you think it\'ll be.
Tom and Mary were both born in Boston and they grew up there.
Don\'t you ever get bored singing the same songs every night?
Don\'t you understand the difference between right and wrong?
